text: Fueled by purpose and relentless curiosity, we fearlessly dive into complex datasets, creating technological solutions that bring life to the numbers.
We uncover nuanced patterns and derive actionable insights, transforming raw data into tangible value and driving impactful decisions.

topics.title: BI & Analytics
topics.text: Transforming raw data into actionable insights, enabling data-driven decisions to optimize performance and drive growth.

team.title: The Mind Behind UMN
team.text: At the heart of UMN is a singular team, strategists, scientists, and creators bound by a fierce commitment: to turn complexity into competitive advantage. Led by Gil Gaspar, whose vision unites data science, change management and strategic thinking, we do not accept limits. We take on challenges that demand precision, creativity, and absolute discretion.
